item.description:
This is planned to be a 1- 1.25 hour hike through the wooded areas of Mansfield Hollow State Park along the water's edge. Trails are mostly flat, and are even old pavement in some places. I'll be bringing a pair of fox terriers for their playtime: other offleash, friendly dogs are also welcome, just let me know in advance.

Hopefully the weather will cooperate!!!

We will meet at the Field Trial Area parking lot, which is located at the end of N. Windham Rd, right where it dead-ends. Please try to be punctual if you RSVP yes, since we will have limited daylight.

If you have any questions about the location, feel free to give me a call on 860-634-6541 (cell).
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the parking lot with a black SUV and two fox terriers

group.name: The NorthEast Connecticut Friends Meetup Group

item.name: Late Afternoon Hiking in Mansfield Hollow
